questions.question: Which query operator in MongoDB can be used to search for specific elements in an array?
questions.explanation: The $elemMatch operator is used to match elements in an array that meet specified criteria. It allows you to specify multiple conditions for array elements.

questions.question: Where are MongoDB indexes stored?

options.A: In the same file as collection data

questions.explanation: MongoDB stores indexes in separate index files, which are kept separate from collection data. This design improves query performance and allows for flexible index management.
